english.segment1: Everyday we keep on pushing on. Knowing we can only push so far. Is it hard enough, is it hard enough. Hard enough.
english.segment2: Gentle breezes slowly failing me. Still we level everything we see. Is it hard enough, is it hard enough. Hard enough.
english.segment3: Blinding lights, a road ahead. Is it real to me or in my head, And I can see what we all held on to. What do you hold on to?
english.segment4: When we believed that we could. When we believed that we should. When we believed in the way we used to be.
